title: Crazy Stubborn Love
description: In the sixth book in the Stubborn series, Avery Ross and Gabriel Halden relocate to the Coyote Crossing Hotel where Avery suspects foul play from some of the guests. While Gabe and his brothers face setbacks in developing their land, an estranged face from the past drops off a special delivery. Chaos ensues within the family, and Avery finds herself torn between family loyalty and advocating for the unwelcome visitor.Following a treacherous storm of ill-fated events, Avery struggles to make sense of Gabeâ€™s illusive behavior and questions his involvement with troublesome outsiders. Conflict escalates when Gabe and his brothers attempt to upstage each other, but Judson makes the ultimate announcement and leaves Avery reeling. Before she can recover from her shock, the unimaginable happens, leaving everyone to deal with immense devastation.This young adult romance series is meant to be read in order.
author: Jeanne  Arnold
